statements: SELECT * FROM RouteOptimization;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM RouteOptimization WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT end_location, start_location, distance FROM RouteOptimization WHERE time_estimate < 30;
SELECT route_id, traffic_conditions, time_estimate FROM RouteOptimization WHERE distance > 20 ORDER BY time_estimate DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, time_estimate FROM RouteOptimization WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic';
SELECT * FROM RouteOptimization WHERE start_location='City A' AND end_location='City B';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM RouteOptimization WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, traffic_conditions FROM RouteOptimization WHERE traffic_conditions='Heavy Traffic' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT route_id, time_estimate, time_estimate*10 AS estimated_time FROM RouteOptimization WHERE time_estimate < 30 ORDER BY estimated_time ASC;

SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance, traffic_conditions FROM RouteOptimization WHERE start_location='City C' OR traffic_conditions='Moderate Traffic' ORDER BY distance, time_estimate DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data
SELECT route_id, traffic_density FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE traffic_density > 0.5
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes
SELECT id, historical_time FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY historical_time DESC
SELECT AVG(traffic_density) AS average_density FROM historical_traffic_data
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY historical_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT route_id, AVG(traffic_density) as avg_density FROM historical_traffic_data GROUP BY route_id;
SELECT start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_name LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY route_id;
SELECT MAX(traffic_density) as max_density, MIN(traffic_density) as min_density FROM historical_traffic_data GROUP BY route_id HAVING max_density > 0.5;
SELECT route_id, traffic_density, historical_time FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE historical_time >= '2020-01-01' AND historical_time < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY traffic_intensity DESC;
SELECT id, route_name, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_intensity > 50;
SELECT * FROM route_history WHERE average_speed < 60 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT route_id, optimization_strategy, optimized_route FROM route_optimization WHERE optimization_strategy = 'Shortest Path';
SELECT * FROM traffic_patterns ORDER BY start_location DESC;
SELECT route_name, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_patterns WHERE traffic_intensity > 50;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_patterns WHERE start_location = 'City A';
SELECT route_name, average_speed, traffic_delay FROM traffic_patterns JOIN route_history ON traffic_patterns.id = route_history.route_id WHERE average_speed < 60;
SELECT route_name, optimization_strategy, optimized_route FROM traffic_patterns JOIN route_optimization ON traffic_patterns.id = route_optimization.route_id ORDER BY route_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM road_segments;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE distance > 10;
SELECT incident_type, description FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT segment_id, traffic_data FROM road_segments WHERE segment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM road_segments WHERE segment_id = 1 ORDER BY start_point_id DESC
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes WHERE start_point_id = 10 AND end_point_id = 15
SELECT segment_id, traffic_data FROM road_segments WHERE JSON_EXTRACT(traffic_data, '$.congestion') = 'high'
SELECT incident_type, description FROM traffic_incidents ORDER BY incident_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM historical_traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT * FROM RouteOptimizationSystem;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteOptimizationSystem ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM MapLocations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_name, traffic_intensity FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_intensity > 50 ORDER BY pattern_id;
SELECT * FROM RouteHistory WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM RouteOptimizationSystem;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteOptimizationSystem WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT pattern_name, traffic_intensity FROM TrafficPatterns ORDER BY traffic_intensity DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM MapLocations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT route_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM RouteHistory WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time ASC;
